TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingGroup extends System.Windows.DependencyObject

summary.span: 包含绑定集合和用于验证对象的 对象。

span.span: Contains a collection of bindings and objects that are used to validate an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在多个绑定之间创建关系，可以同时验证和更新这些绑定。A creates a relationship between multiple bindings, which can be validated and updated together. 例如，假设应用程序提示用户输入地址。For example, suppose that an application prompts the user to enter an address. 然后，应用程序使用用户提供的值填充 `Address`类型的对象，该对象具有属性、`Street`、`City`、`ZipCode`和 `Country`。The application then populates an object of type `Address`, which has the properties, `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, and `Country`, with the values that the user provided. 应用程序具有一个包含四个 控件的面板，其中每个控件都绑定到对象的一个属性。The application has a panel that contains four controls, each of which is data bound to one of the object's properties. 可以在 中使用 来验证 `Address` 对象。You can use a in a to validate the `Address` object. 如果绑定参与相同的 ，则可以确保邮政编码对地址的国家/地区有效。If the bindings participate in the same , you can ensure that the zip-code is valid for the country/region of the address. 设置 或 上的 属性。You set the property on or . 子元素从其父元素继承 ，就像任何其他可继承的属性一样。Child elements inherit the from their parent elements, just as with any other inheritable property. 如果发生以下情况之一，则会将子代元素上的绑定添加到 ：A binding on a descendent element is added to a if one of the following situations occurs: - 绑定的源和具有 的元素的 是同一对象，但未设置 属性。The binding's source and the of the element that has the are the same object and the property is not set. - 绑定的 属性等于 的 ，未显式设置为 `null`。The property of the binding is equal to the of the and they are not explicitly set to `null`. 在地址示例中，假定 的 设置为 `Address`类型的对象。In the example of the address, suppose that the of the is set to the object of type `Address`. 将每个 的绑定添加到面板的 中。The binding for each is added to the of the panel. 将 对象添加到 中。You add objects to a . 当 运行时，将 作为 方法的第一个参数传递。The is passed as the first parameter of the method when the runs. 您可以使用该 上的 或 方法来获取该对象的建议值，并使用 属性获取绑定的源。You can use the or method on that to get the proposed values of the object, and the property to get the sources of the bindings. 同时更新绑定的源，而不是单独更新每个绑定。A updates the sources of the binding at the same time instead of each binding being updated separately. 当调用其中一种方法来验证数据（、或 ）时，将对该示例中的每个 的绑定进行验证并可能更新。When you call one of the methods to validate the data (, , or ), the binding for each in the example is validated and potentially updated. 当绑定是 的一部分时，除非显式设置 属性，否则将不会更新绑定的源，直到在 上调用 或 。When a binding is part of a , the source of the binding is not updated until you call or on the , unless you explicitly set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个应用程序，该应用程序提示用户输入商品的描述和价格以及产品/服务的到期日期。The following examples create an application that prompts the user to enter the description and price of an item and the date that the offer expires. 应用程序将在窗体下显示项的当前信息。The application displays the current information for the item below the form. 用户可以提交或取消更改。The user can submit or cancel the changes. 应用程序执行以下操作来实现此行为。The application does the following to achieve this behavior. - 创建 ，并在创建应用程序 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 时将其添加到根 。Creates a and adds it the root when it creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of the application. - 在应用程序的逻辑中调用 、和 ，以便回滚更改。Calls , , and in the application's logic to enable rolling back changes. - 调用 方法中的 以获取用户的输入，然后检查100美元的项是否至少有七天可用。Calls in a method to get the user's input and then check that an item over 100 dollars is available for at least seven days. 下面的示例创建了应用程序的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。The following example creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of the application. 根 具有一个包含验证项的 的 ，如前文所述。The root has a that contains a that validates the item, as described previously. `Price` 属性和 `OfferExpires` 属性上的绑定对象将成为 的一部分，并且每个绑定都有一个 以确保价格和日期分别为有效值。The binding objects on the `Price` property and the `OfferExpires` property become part of the and each binding has a to make sure that price and date, respectively, are valid values. 单个属性的验证规则在 上的 之前运行。The validation rules for the individual properties run before the on the . [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#WindowLayout](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#windowlayout)] 下面的示例演示应用程序的事件处理程序。The following example shows the event handlers for the application. 当用户单击 "提交" 按钮时，应用程序会调用 来运行与 关联的每个 。When the user clicks the Submit button, the application calls to run each that is associated with the . 如果每个 成功，则 会将值保存到对象并结束编辑事务。If each succeeds, saves the values to the object and ends the edit transaction. 如果 成功，则应用程序将开始另一个编辑事务。If is successful, the application begins another edit transaction. 当 失败时，将发生 事件，原因是应用程序 设置为 上的 `true` （在上一示例中）。When a fails, the event occurs because the application set to `true` on the (in the previous example). `ItemError` 处理 事件，并向用户显示有关验证错误的信息。`ItemError` handles the event and displays information about the validation error to the user. 该示例还处理 的 事件，以及 "**取消**" 按钮的 事件。The example also handles the event for the and the event for the **Cancel** button. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#WindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#windowlogic)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#WindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#windowlogic)] 下面的示例演示自定义 `ValidateDateAndPrice`，它已添加到第一个示例中的 。The following example shows the custom `ValidateDateAndPrice`, which was added to the in the first example. 使用其 方法中的 来获取用户在表单中输入的值，并检查项目是否超过100美元，是否可用于至少7天。The uses the in its method to get the values the user entered into the form, and checks that if an item is over 100 dollars, it will be available for at least seven days. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidateObject](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Data.cs#validateobject)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidateObject](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/data.vb#validateobject)]

summary.span: 开始 中源上的编辑事务。

span.span: Begins an edit transaction on the sources in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 中的源支持放弃挂起的更改，则可以调用 以开始编辑事务，调用 保存挂起的更改，调用 以放弃挂起的更改。If the sources in the support discarding pending changes, you can call to begin the edit transaction, call to save the pending changes, call to discard the pending changes. 对于实现 的 中的每个对象， 调用 For each object in that implements , calls ## Examples 下面的示例在窗口加载以开始编辑事务时调用 。The following example calls when a window loads to begin the edit transaction. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果发生以下情况之一，则 属于 ：A belongs to a if one of the following cases occurs: - 绑定的源和具有 的元素的 是同一对象，但未设置 。The binding's source and the of the element that has the are the same object and the is not set. - 绑定的 属性和 的 设置为相同的非 null 值，并且 属于绑定的目标元素的父元素。The property of the binding and the of the are set to the same non-null value and the belongs to a parent element of the binding's target element. - 向 添加 。You add a to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 结束编辑事务并放弃挂起的更改。

span.span: Ends the edit transaction and discards the pending changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果源对象能够执行此操作并结束编辑事务，则此方法会导致源放弃挂起的更改。This method causes the sources to discard the pending changes, if a source object is capable of doing so and end the edit transaction. 然后，方法用保存的源值更新目标属性。Then the method updates the target properties with the saved source values. 对于实现 的 中的每个对象， 调用 For each object in that implements , calls ## Examples 下面的示例调用 放弃挂起的更改，然后调用 准备重新编辑的源。The following example calls to discard the pending changes and then calls to prepare the source to be re-edited. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#canceledit)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#canceledit)]

summary.span: 运行所有 对象，并且在所有验证规则都成功时，更新绑定源。

returns.span: 如果每个 都成功且将值提交到了源，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果每个 成功，则此方法会导致源提交挂起的更改并结束编辑事务（如果源对象可以这样做）。If every succeeds, this method causes the sources to commit the pending changes and end the edit transaction, if a source object is capable of doing so. 对于实现 的 中的每个对象， 调用 For each object in that implements , calls ## Examples 下面的示例调用 来保存挂起的更改，然后调用 来准备重新编辑的源。The following example calls to save the pending changes and then calls to prepare the source to be re-edited. MemberSignature.Value: public object GetValue (object item, string propertyName);

Public Function GetValue (item As Object, propertyName As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetValue(System::Object ^ item, System::String ^ propertyName);

span.span: The object that contains the specified property.

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 要获取其建议值的属性。

span.span: The property whose proposed value to get.

summary.span: 返回指定的属性和项的建议值。

span.span: Returns the proposed value for the specified property and item.
The proposed property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法中的此方法获取要提交到源的值。Use this method in the method to get the value to be committed to the source. 返回值的类型取决于出现 的阶段。The type of the return value depends on the stage at which the occurs. 例如，如果 是绑定到类型为 integer 的属性的数据，并且调用 的 的 设置为 ，则该方法将返回一个字符串。For example, if a is data bound to a property of type integer and the that calls has its set to , the method returns a string. 如果 的 设置为 ，则该方法将返回绑定的转换器返回的任何类型。If the has its set to , the method returns whatever type that is returned by the binding's converter. 在此示例中， 通常返回整数。In this example, usually returns an integer. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个应用程序的一部分，该应用程序提示用户输入多个客户，并为每个客户分配一个销售代表。The following example is part of an application that prompts the user to enter multiple customers and assign a sales representative to each customer. 应用程序将检查销售代表和客户是否属于同一区域。The application checks that the sales representative and the customer belong to the same region. 该示例演示 方法，该方法使用 方法获取客户输入的值。The example shows the method, which uses the method to get values that the customer entered. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#ItemBindGroupValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#itembindgroupvalidationrule)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#ItemBindGroupValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window2.xaml.vb#itembindgroupvalidationrule)]

exception.span: 指定项和属性之间没有绑定。

span.span: There is not a binding for the specified item and property.

exception.span: 由于转换错误或早期验证规则失败，指定的属性值不可用。

span.span: The value of the specified property is not available, due to a conversion error or because an earlier validation rule failed.

summary.span: 获取 中的绑定对象所使用的源。

span.span: Gets the sources that are used by the Binding objects in the .

value.span: 中的绑定对象所使用的源。

span.span: The sources that are used by the Binding objects in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用作源的每个对象都会添加到 属性一次，即使该对象用作多个绑定的源也是如此。Each object that is used as a source is added into the property once, even if the object is used as the source for multiple bindings. 通常，中只有一个项，这是使用 的元素 的对象。Often, there is just one item in , which is the object that is the of the element that uses the . 但 可以有多个源。It is possible for a to have multiple sources, however. 例如，如果绑定对象共享相同的 但使用不同的源对象，则用作源的每个对象都在 中。For example, if Binding objects share the same but use different source objects, each object that is used as a source is in . 如果绑定的路径解析为源的嵌套属性，则 中也可以有多个对象。There can also be multiple objects in if the path of a Binding resolves to a nested property of the source. 例如，假设 控件的绑定是 的一部分，并且其 是 `Customer` 对象，该对象的属性类型为 `Address`。For example, suppose a control's binding is a part of a and its is a `Customer` object, which has a property of type `Address`. 如果 的 是 `Address.ZipCode` 属性，则 `Address` 将添加到 属性。If the of the is the `Address.ZipCode` property, the `Address` is added to the property. ## Examples 以下示例是应用程序的一部分，用于检查用户是否已将两个对象的属性设置为相等值。The following examples are part of an application that checks whether the user has set the properties of two objects to equal values. 第一个示例创建两个 控件，其中每个控件都是绑定到不同源的数据。The first example creates two controls, each of which are data bound to a different source. 第一个 的绑定从 控件的父元素的 获取其源 `object1`（）。The binding of the first gets its source, `object1`, from the of the control's parent element (the ). 在第二个 上，绑定的源设置为 `object2`。On the second , the source of the binding is set to `object2`. 该示例还创建了一个显示验证错误的 。The example also creates a that displays validation errors. [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupName](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#bindinggroupname)] [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidationAdornerSite](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#validationadornersite)] 下面的示例演示上一示例使用的 。The following example shows the that the previous example uses. 在 方法中，该示例从 中获取每个源对象，并检查对象的属性是否相等。In the method, the example gets each source object from the and checks whether the properties of the objects are equal. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml.cs#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window3.xaml.vb#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)]

summary.span: 获取或设置标识 的名称，该名称可用于在 中包括和排除绑定对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that identifies the , which can be used to include and exclude Binding objects in the .
The name that identifies the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `null`，则其源与具有 的元素的 具有相同对象的绑定会加入到 中。If is `null`, bindings that have a source that is the same object as the of the element that has the participate in the . 可以通过将 的 和绑定的 "" 属性设置为相同的值，将具有不同于父元素的 的绑定包括 。You can include bindings that have a source that is different from the of the parent element that has the by setting of the and the property of a binding to the same value. 您可以通过将 的 和绑定的 属性设置为不同的值，排除与具有 的父元素 具有相同源的绑定。You can exclude bindings that have the same source as of the parent element that has the by setting of the and the property of a binding to different values. ## Examples 以下示例是应用程序的一部分，用于检查用户是否已将两个对象的属性设置为相等值。The following examples are part of an application that checks whether the user has set the properties of two objects to equal values. 第一个示例创建两个 控件，其中每个控件都是绑定到不同源的数据。The first example creates two controls, each of which are data bound to a different source. 第一个 的绑定是 的一部分，因为 继承其父 的 和 。The binding of the first is part of the because the inherits the and from its parent . 第二个 上的绑定是 的一部分，因为 的 和 的 都设置为 `bindingGroup`。The binding on the second is part of the because the of the and the of the are both set to `bindingGroup`. [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupName](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#bindinggroupname)] [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidationAdornerSite](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#validationadornersite)] 下面的示例演示上一示例使用的 。The following example shows the that the previous example uses. 在 方法中，该示例从 中获取每个源对象，并检查对象的属性是否相等。In the method, the example gets each source object from the and checks whether the properties of the objects are equal. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml.cs#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window3.xaml.vb#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否重新使用尚未提交到源的目标值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the reuses target values that have not been committed to the source.

value.span: 如果 重新使用尚未提交到源的目标值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the reuses target values that have not been committed to the source; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的值是在绑定的目标上已更改但尚未提交到源的值。A proposed value is a value that has been changed on the target of a binding, but has not been committed to the source. 例如，假设 上有一个双向绑定，而 属性设置为 ""。For example, suppose that there is a two-way binding on a and the property is set to . 如果用户更改了 的值，则建议的值是在将其提交到源之前 中的值。If the user changes the value of the , the proposed value is the value that is in the before it is committed to source. 当 `true` 时， 使用建议的值，System.windows.data.bindinggroup> 一个绑定离开了，而另一个具有相同源的绑定联接了 System.windows.data.bindinggroup>。When is `true`, the uses the proposed value when one binding leaves the BindingGroup and another Binding with the same source joins the BindingGroup. 例如，假设应用程序允许用户编辑多个字段，并通过单击按钮来更新源对象。For example, suppose that an application enables a user to edit multiple fields and update the source object by clicking a button. 未编辑字段时，应用程序会将其显示在 中。When a field is not being edited, the application displays it in a . 当用户开始编辑某个字段时，应用程序会将 替换为 。When the user begins to edit a field, the application replaces the with a . 当用户完成字段编辑后，应用程序会将 替换为 。When the user finishes editing that field, the application replaces the with a . 由于在用户单击该按钮之前不会更新源，因此必须有一种方法来使 显示建议的值。Because the source is not updated until the user clicks the button, there must be a way for the to display the proposed value. 通过将 设置为 `true`，应用程序将显示用户对字段所做的更改，即使未更新源也是如此。By setting to `true`, the application will display the user's changes to a field even when the source has not been updated.

summary.span: 尝试获取指定属性和项的建议值。

span.span: Attempts to get the proposed value for the specified property and item.

returns.span: 如果值为指定属性的建议值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if value is the proposed value for the specified property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有指定项和属性的绑定，或指定属性的值不可用，则 返回 `false`，因为存在转换错误或早期验证规则失败。 returns `false` if there is not a binding for the specified item and property or if the value of the specified property is not available, due to a conversion error or because an earlier validation rule failed. 使用 方法中的此方法获取要提交到源的值。Use this method in the method to get the value to be committed to the source. `value` 类型取决于 发生的阶段。The type `value` depends on the stage at which the occurs. 例如，如果 是绑定到类型为 integer 的属性的数据，则 `value` 是一个字符串（如果调用 的 将其 设置为 。For example, if a is data bound to a property of type integer, `value` is a string if the that calls has its set to . 如果 的 设置为 ，则 `value` 类型为绑定的转换器返回的任何类型。If the has its set to , the type of `value` is whatever type that is returned by the binding's converter. 在此示例中，`value` 通常为一个整数。In this example, `value` is usually an integer. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为 `ValidateDateAndPrice`的自定义 。The following example creates a custom named `ValidateDateAndPrice`. 在 方法中，该示例使用 方法和 属性获取用户在窗体中输入的值。In the method, the example uses the method and the property to get the values the user entered into the form. 然后，该示例将检查某一项是否超过100美元，该项目将在至少7天内可用。Then the example checks that if an item is over 100 dollars, it will be available for at least seven days. 此示例摘自 类的更大示例This example is part of a larger example on the class [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidateObject](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Data.cs#validateobject)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#ValidateObject](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/data.vb#validateobject)]

summary.span: 如果所有验证规则都成功，则对绑定和将 属性设置为 、 或 的 对象运行转换器，并将目标值保存到源对象。

span.span: Runs the converter on the binding and the objects that have the property set to , , or and saves the values of the targets to the source objects if all the validation rules succeed.

returns.span: 如果所有验证规则都成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if all validation rules succeed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果每个 成功，则此方法会更新源，但不会导致源提交挂起的更改并结束编辑事务。This method updates the source if every succeeds, but it does not cause the sources to commit the pending changes and end the edit transaction. 也就是说，如果源对象实现 。That is, if the source object implements . 调用此方法不会导致调用 。Calling this method does not cause to be called. 使用 方法让源提交挂起的更改。Use the method to have the sources commit the pending changes. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个应用程序的一部分，该应用程序提示用户输入多个客户，并为每个客户分配一个销售代表。The following example is part of an application that prompts the user to enter multiple customers and assign a sales representative to each customer. 应用程序将检查销售代表和客户是否属于同一区域。The application checks that the sales representative and the customer belong to the same region. 如果所有验证规则都成功，则示例将调用 来验证绑定并将值保存到源。The example calls to validate the bindings and save the values to the source if all the validation rules succeed. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#UpdateSources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#updatesources)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#UpdateSources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window2.xaml.vb#updatesources)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向 中添加 时， 作为 方法的第一个参数传入。When a is added to a , the is passed in as the first parameter of the method. 可以通过使用 或 方法来获取对象的建议值。You can get the proposed values of the object by using the or method. 可以从 属性获取作为绑定源的对象。You can get the objects that are the sources of the bindings from the property. ## Examples 下面的示例将自定义 `ValidateDateAndPrice`添加到 。The following example adds the custom , `ValidateDateAndPrice`, to the . [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#bindinggroup)] 下面的示例展示了 `ValidateDateAndPrice` 类。The following example shows the `ValidateDateAndPrice` class. 方法使用 获取用户在窗体中输入的值，并检查项是否超过100美元，它是否可用于至少7天。The method uses the to get the values the user entered into the form, and checks that if an item is over 100 dollars, it will be available for at least seven days.
